description: This program will execute an RFI strategy as can be created with the RFI gui and executes it on one or several observations.

parameters.info: overrides the number of threads specified in the strategy (default: one thread for each CPU core)
parameters.name: threads

parameters.info: will reorder the measurement set before starting, which is normally faster but requires free disk space to reorder the data to
parameters.name: indirect-read

parameters.info: will read the entire measurement set in memory. This is the fastest, but requires much memory.
parameters.name: memory-read

parameters.info: will select either memory or direct mode based on available memory
parameters.name: auto-read-mode

parameters.info: reads uvw values (some exotic strategies require these)
parameters.name: uvw

parameters.info: will skip an ms if it has already been processed by AOFlagger according to its HISTORY table.
parameters.name: skip-flagged

parameters.info: comma separated list of (zero-indexed) band ids to process
parameters.name: bands

parameters.info: Field ID(s). Comma separated string if more than one field
parameters.name: fields
